metadata.title: Wallnut: WebView Tester
metadata.subtitle: WebView Tester with DevTools
metadata.description:
Wallnut is a developer tool for testing WKWebView and SFSafariViewController configurations.
FEATURES
WebView Testing • Switch between WKWebView and SFSafariViewController modes • Real-time configuration changes (JavaScript, cookies, media playback, etc.) • Responsive viewport resizing for testing different screen sizes • Screenshot capture (WKWebView only)
Built-in DevTools (WKWebView) • Console: Capture console.log, warn, error, and table outputs • Network: Monitor fetch/XHR requests with timing and response data • Storage: Inspect localStorage, sessionStorage, and cookies • Performance: View Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS) and Navigation Timing • Sources: Browse DOM tree, stylesheets, and inline scripts • Accessibility: axe-core based accessibility audit
SFSafariViewController • Native Safari experience with content blockers support • Safari cookies and login sessions shared • Reader mode and Safari extensions available
Developer Utilities • API Capability detection (Geolocation, Camera, WebRTC, etc.) • Custom User-Agent configuration • Bookmark management for frequently tested URLs • Device and browser info panel with benchmark results
Note: Some Web APIs are restricted in WKWebView due to WebKit security policies. DevTools features require WKWebView mode.
Built for developers who need to test WebView behavior without building a separate test app.
metadata.promotional_text: Test WebView configurations in real-time. Built-in DevTools: Console, Network, Storage, Performance, Sources. Customize User Agent, capture screenshots, and more.
